chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: Type
P: seq T -> Type

Goal:
P [::] -> (forall (s : seq T) (t : T), P s -> P (rcons s t)) -> forall s : seq T, P s

Premises:
Notation seq := list
rcons = fun T : Type => fix rcons (s : seq T) (z : T) {struct s} : seq T := match s with | [::] => [:: z] | x :: s' => x :: rcons s' z end : forall T : Type, seq T -> T -> seq T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope seq_scope _]
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.E.t = positive : Set
last_ind : forall (T : Type) (P : seq T -> Type), P [::] -> (forall (s : seq T) (x : T), P s -> P (rcons s x)) -> forall s : seq T, P s
seq_ind2 : forall P0 : seq ?S -> seq ?T -> Type, P0 [::] [::] -> (forall (x : ?S) (y : ?T) (s : seq ?S) (t : seq ?T), size s = size t -> P0 s t -> P0 (x :: s) (y :: t)) -> forall (s : seq ?S) (t : seq ?T), size s = size t -> P0 s t where ?S : [T : Type P : seq T -> Type |- Type] ?T : [T : Type P : seq T -> Type |- Type]
zip_rcons : forall (S T : Type) (s : seq S) (t : seq T) (x : S) (y : T), size s = size t -> zip (rcons s x) (rcons t y) = rcons (zip s t) (x, y)
rcons_injr : forall s : seq ?T, ssrfun.injective (rcons s) where ?T : [T : Type P : seq T -> Type |- Type]
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : seq A -> Prop), P [::] -> (forall (a : A) (l : seq A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : seq A, P l
list_rec : forall (A : Type) (P : seq A -> Set), P [::] -> (forall (a : A) (l : seq A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : seq A, P l
list_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : seq A -> SProp), P [::] -> (forall (a : A) (l : seq A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : seq A, P l
list_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : seq A -> Type), P [::] -> (forall (a : A) (l : seq A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : seq A, P l
List.rev_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : seq A -> Prop), P [::] -> (forall (x : A) (l : seq A), P l -> P (l ++ [:: x])%list) -> forall l : seq A, P l
List.rev_list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : seq A -> Prop), P [::] -> (forall (a : A) (l : seq A), P (List.rev l) -> P (List.rev (a :: l))) -> forall l : seq A, P (List.rev l)
List.NoDup_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : seq A -> Prop), P [::] -> (forall (x : A) (l : seq A), ~ List.In x l -> List.NoDup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : seq A, List.NoDup l -> P l
List.NoDup_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : seq A -> SProp), P [::] -> (forall (x : A) (l : seq A), ~ List.In x l -> List.NoDup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : seq A, List.NoDup l -> P l
Sorted.LocallySorted_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (P : seq A -> Prop), P [::] -> (forall a : A, P [:: a]) -> (forall (a b : A) (l : seq A), Sorted.LocallySorted R (b :: l) -> P (b :: l) -> R a b -> P [:: a, b & l]) -> forall l : seq A, Sorted.LocallySorted R l -> P l
Sorted.LocallySorted_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (P : seq A -> SProp), P [::] -> (forall a : A, P [:: a]) -> (forall (a b : A) (l : seq A), Sorted.LocallySorted R (b :: l) -> P (b :: l) -> R a b -> P [:: a, b & l]) -> forall l : seq A, Sorted.LocallySorted R l -> P l
Sorted.StronglySorted_rect : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (P : seq A -> Type), P [::] -> (forall (a : A) (l : seq A), Sorted.StronglySorted R l -> P l -> List.Forall (R a) l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : seq A, Sorted.StronglySorted R l -> P l
Sorted.StronglySorted_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (P : seq A -> Prop), P [::] -> (forall (a : A) (l : seq A), Sorted.StronglySorted R l -> P l -> List.Forall (R a) l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : seq A, Sorted.StronglySorted R l -> P l
Sorted.StronglySorted_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (P : seq A -> SProp), P [::] -> (forall (a : A) (l : seq A), Sorted.StronglySorted R l -> P l -> List.Forall (R a) l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : seq A, Sorted.StronglySorted R l -> P l
Sorted.Sorted_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (P : seq A -> Prop), P [::] -> (forall (a : A) (l : seq A), Sorted.Sorted R l -> P l -> Sorted.HdRel R a l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : seq A, Sorted.Sorted R l -> P l
Sorted.StronglySorted_rec : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (P : seq A -> Type), P [::] -> (forall (a : A) (l : seq A), Sorted.StronglySorted R l -> P l -> List.Forall (R a) l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : seq A, Sorted.StronglySorted R l -> P l
Sorted.Sorted_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (P : seq A -> SProp), P [::] -> (forall (a : A) (l : seq A), Sorted.Sorted R l -> P l -> Sorted.HdRel R a l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : seq A, Sorted.Sorted R l -> P l
List.ForallOrdPairs_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (P : seq A -> SProp), P [::] -> (forall (a : A) (l : seq A), List.Forall (R a) l -> List.ForallOrdPairs R l -> P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : seq A, List.ForallOrdPairs R l -> P l
List.ForallOrdPairs_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (P : seq A -> Prop), P [::] -> (forall (a : A) (l : seq A), List.Forall (R a) l -> List.ForallOrdPairs R l -> P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : seq A, List.ForallOrdPairs R l -> P l
Sorted.Sorted_rect : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (P : seq A -> Type), P [::] -> (forall (a : A) (l : seq A), Sorted.Sorted R l -> P l -> Sorted.HdRel R a l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : seq A, Sorted.Sorted R l -> P l
SetoidList.NoDupA_sind : forall (A : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : seq A -> SProp), P [::] -> (forall (x : A) (l : seq A), ~ SetoidList.InA eqA x l -> SetoidList.NoDupA eqA l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : seq A, SetoidList.NoDupA eqA l -> P l
SetoidList.NoDupA_ind : forall (A : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : seq A -> Prop), P [::] -> (forall (x : A) (l : seq A), ~ SetoidList.InA eqA x l -> SetoidList.NoDupA eqA l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : seq A, SetoidList.NoDupA eqA l -> P l
Relation_Operators.Ltl_ind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : seq A -> seq A -> Prop), (forall (a : A) (x : seq A), P [::] (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : seq A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : seq A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : seq A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
Relation_Operators.Ltl_sind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : seq A -> seq A -> SProp), (forall (a : A) (x : seq A), P [::] (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : seq A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : seq A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : seq A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
List.Forall2_sind : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (P : seq A -> seq B -> SProp), P [::] [::] -> (forall (x : A) (y : B) (l : seq A) (l' : seq B), R x y -> List.Forall2 R l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (y :: l')) -> forall (l : seq A) (l0 : seq B), List.Forall2 R l l0 -> P l l0
List.Forall2_ind : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (P : seq A -> seq B -> Prop), P [::] [::] -> (forall (x : A) (y : B) (l : seq A) (l' : seq B), R x y -> List.Forall2 R l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (y :: l')) -> forall (l : seq A) (l0 : seq B), List.Forall2 R l l0 -> P l l0
SetoidList.eqlistA_ind : forall (A : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : seq A -> seq A -> Prop), P [::] [::] -> (forall (x x' : A) (l l' : seq A), eqA x x' -> SetoidList.eqlistA eqA l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x' :: l')) -> forall l l0 : seq A, SetoidList.eqlistA eqA l l0 -> P l l0
